original_text: I weep for the vines of Sibmah, more than Jazer weeps. The branches of those vines reached across the sea as far as Jazer. 48: The vines are a picture of Moab's strength. Other nations enjoyed the good things that they received from Moab. The sea is the Dead Sea. But the cruel enemy will destroy all the fruit that grows on your vines and trees. I weep for the vines of Sibmah, more than Jazer weeps. The branches of those vines reached across the sea as far as Jazer. 48: The vines are a picture of Moab's strength. Other nations enjoyed the good things that they received from Moab. The sea is the Dead Sea. But the cruel enemy will destroy all the fruit that grows on your vines and trees. I weep for the vines of Sibmah, more than Jazer weeps.
korean_text: 십마의 포도나무여 너의 가지가 바다를 넘어 야셀 바다까지 뻗었더니 너의 여름 과일과 포도 수확을 탈취하는 자가 나타났으니 내가 너를 위하여 울기를 야셀이 우는 것보다 더하리로다

sentences.original_text: I weep for the vines of Sibmah
The branches of those vines reached across the sea
sentences.korean_translation: 그 포도나무의 가지들이 바다를 가로질러 뻗었다

sentences.original_text: The vines are a picture of Moab's strength
Other nations enjoyed the good things
The sea is the Dead Sea
But the cruel enemy will destroy all the fruit
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 잔인한 적이 모든 열매를 파괴할 것이다

sentences.original_text: that grows on your vines and trees
